short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pinnacle of Apple Portable Protection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MacCase invented the Apple-specific case market in 1999 and continues to be the leader in portable hardware protection. We offer innovative, hand-made cases, sleeves, backpacks, messenger bags and briefcases exquisitely designed in both leather and nylon for Apple iPads and MacBook Pros. In addition, we have several models designed to fit tablets and laptops from any manufacturer.
